tasks.task: Attaching chains to a tractor.
subtasks: Approach the tractor and access the hitch area.
Identify the correct chain for attachment.
Lift the chain and position it over the tractor's hitch.
Secure the chain to the tractor using appropriate fasteners.

tasks.task: Operating a bulldozer to cut down trees.
subtasks: Enter the bulldozer and start the engine.
Position the bulldozer at the edge of the area with trees.
Engage the blade and move it to cut down the trees.
Navigating the bulldozer around obstacles while cutting.
Load fallen trees onto transport vehicles.
Clean up debris and ensure site safety after completion.

tasks.task: Driving a John Deere tractor to till fields.
subtasks: Start the John Deere tractor and conduct pre-operation checks.
Operate the tractor to navigate to the fields.
Engage the tilling attachments and initiate the tillage process.
Monitor and adjust the depth of the tillage as needed.
Continue tilling until the fields are properly prepared.

tasks.task: Mounting and riding an all-terrain vehicle (ATV) to inspect crops.
subtasks: Prepare the ATV by checking fuel, tires, and safety gear.
Start the ATV and drive to the inspection area.
Navigate through rows of crops while looking for signs of stress or disease.
Document any issues observed during the inspection.
Descend from the ATV safely at the conclusion of the inspection.

tasks.task: Pumping irrigation water onto farmland.
subtasks: Operate the irrigation pump to start water flow.
Regulate the water pressure and flow rate to match field needs.
Navigate the irrigation system to cover all necessary areas.
Monitor the irrigation process to prevent overwetting or uneven distribution.

tasks.task: Fixing a side mirror on a tractor.
subtasks: Secure the tractor in a safe, stable location.
Identify the broken side mirror and gather replacement parts.
Remove the damaged mirror, following safety precautions.
Align the new mirror with the existing components.
Secure the mirror in place using the proper mounting method.
Test the mirror's functionality and adjust as necessary.

tasks.task: Assisting with the loading of hay onto a flatbed truck.
subtasks: Gather the hay from the storage area and transport it to the loading zone.
Lift the hay bales onto the truck bed, ensuring even distribution.
Secure the hay to prevent movement during transport.
Verify that the load is safe and stable.

tasks.task: Compacting soil with a steamroller.
subtasks: Position the steamroller at the designated compaction area.
Start the steamroller and roll over the soil to compact it.
Monitor the compaction process for optimal results.
Move the steamroller to new areas as needed.

tasks.task: Conducting hay bale substrate sampling.
subtasks: Secure the appropriate tools for sampling (e.g., trowel,ziplock bag).
Locate the area within the hay bale where sampling is needed.
Break open the hay bale carefully without causing too much dust.
Collect a representative sample of substrate from the hay.
Seal the sample in the container and label it properly.

tasks.task: Transferring sand from a truck to a storage bin.
subtasks: Open the truck bed and wait for it to stabilize.
Wear protective gear appropriate for handling sand.
Use a scoop or shovel to transfer sand into the storage bin.
Ensure the sand is evenly distributed in the bin.
Close the bin cover if applicable and secure it.

tasks.task: Preparing a truck to haul sand.
subtasks: Check the truck's tires, brakes, and overall condition.
Attach weigh scales to verify load weight if necessary.
Load the sand onto the truck, ensuring it is balanced and secure.
Secure the tarp or cover over the sand load.
Start the truck and transport it to the designated location.

tasks.task: Loading irrigation pipe onto a flatbed.
subtasks: Organize the pipe sections and prepare them for stacking.
Lift the pipe onto the flatbed, often requiring coordination with others.
Secure the pipe with straps or chains to prevent movement during transport.
Verify that all sections are accounted for and properly loaded.

tasks.task: Transporting soil samples to the office.
subtasks: Collect the soil samples from the field, using a shovel or sampling tool.
Package the samples in containers with identifying labels.
Load the samples into a vehicle.
Maintain the integrity of the samples during transportation.

tasks.task: Loading a John Deere skid steer with fertilizer.
subtasks: Position the skid steer in the fertilizer storage area.
Unload the fertilizer into the skid steer's hopper.
Check the hopper for proper filling and secure any lids.
Transport the skid steer to the field, maintaining balance.

tasks.task: Adjusting the alignment of farm machinery.
subtasks: Examine the machinery for proper alignment, such as plowshares or mower blades.
Measure the alignment using tools such as a string or laser level.
Make necessary adjustments to achieve straight lines or even cuts.
Test the adjusted machinery to ensure accuracy.

tasks.task: Disassembling and reattaching windrow catchers on a combine harvester.
subtasks: Halt the combine harvester operation and acquire necessary tools.
Remove the existing windrow catcher, handling sharp edges carefully.
Inspect the catcher for wear or damage.
Install the replacement catcher or make needed repairs.
Reconnect all components and ensure they are secure.
Test the combine's operation to confirm proper windrow formation.

tasks.task: Using a power washer to clean a combine harvester.
subtasks: Disconnect the combine harvester and prepare it for cleaning.
Set up the power washer and direct the water jets at the appropriate angles.
Clean all surfaces of the combine, paying attention to joints and crevices.
Allow the combine to dry before reassembling.

tasks.task: Using a drone to observe agricultural fields.
subtasks: Operate the drone to fly over the fields, adjusting altitude as needed.
Record visual data, such as crop health or irrigation coverage.
Analyze the drone footage to identify problem areas or variances.
Share findings with the agricultural team for management decisions.

tasks.task: Opening a fueling port on a combine harvester.
subtasks: Stop the combine harvester operation.
Locate the fueling port access panel.
Remove any security covers or locks.
Unlock and open the fueling port, ensuring proper ventilation.
Refuel the combine, monitoring levels to prevent overfilling.
Reassemble the fueling port and close all openings.

tasks.task: Seeding a field with a drill.
subtasks: Position the drilling equipment over the field's center.
Prepare the seed by checking quality and calibration.
Engage the drill and distribute seeds evenly across the field.
Monitor planting depth and spacing, adjusting as needed.
Continue seeding until the field is covered with planted rows.

tasks.task: Conducting irrigation system maintenance.
subtasks: Shut down and isolate the irrigation system.
Inspect the pipes, valves, and nozzles for leaks or blockages.
Clean and replace any damaged components.
Test the system to ensure proper water flow and coverage.
Document any repairs and maintenance performed.

tasks.task: Lubricating the chains on a hay baler.
subtasks: Identify the appropriate lubricant for the hay baler chains.
Disassemble the baler to access the chain lubrication points.
Apply lubricant to the chains, following the manufacturer's instructions.
Reassemble the baler and test its operation.

tasks.task: Placing fertilizer shot tubes in the soil during application.
subtasks: Locate the planting rows or areas where fertilizer is needed.
Insert the shot tubes into the soil at the correct depth and spacing.
Confirm the tubes are aligned properly for optimal fertilizer distribution.
Cover the tubes with soil to secure them in place.

tasks.task: Adjusting a blower fence on a grain auger.
subtasks: Identify the optimal position for the blower fence to handle grain flow.
Remove the current fence and measure necessary adjustments.
Install the fence in the new position, ensuring it's secure.
Test the fence's effectiveness with grain passing through.

tasks.task: Planting corn with a planter.
subtasks: Set up the corn planter in the field, calibrating seed depth and spacing.
Operate the planter, moving it along the rows to plant seeds.
Monitor planting progress and check for accurate placement.
Continue planting until the desired coverage is achieved.

tasks.task: Climbing an irrigation tower to service sprinklers.
subtasks: Ascend the irrigation tower safely using a ladder or aerial lift.
Inspect the sprinkler heads for proper rotation and spray patterns.
Adjust or replace any malfunctioning sprinkler components.
Descend the tower and verify all repairs.

tasks.task: Choosing the appropriate seed planting depth.
subtasks: Assess the soil conditions to determine appropriate planting depth.
Refer to seed planting guidelines or consult with an expert.
Adjust the planter depth setter accordingly for accurate planting.

tasks.task: Interpreting the results from a soil moisture sensor.
subtasks: Retrieve the data from the moisture sensor probe.
Evaluate the moisture levels in relation to plant needs.
Adjust irrigation schedules based on sensor readings.
Document the sensor's performance and any necessary recalibration.

tasks.task: Guiding a plow behind a tractor.
subtasks: Secure a plow attachment to the tractor.
Position the plow in the correct orientation for the task.
Align the plow with the existing furrows or planting rows.
Guide the tractor along the intended path, keeping the plow oriented.
Monitor the depth and direction of the plow for consistency.

tasks.task: Attaching chains to a tractor.
subtasks: Approach the tractor and access the hitch area.
Identify the correct chain for attachment.
Lift the chain and position it over the tractor's hitch.
Secure the chain to the tractor using appropriate fasteners.

tasks.task: Adjusting the alignment of farm machinery.
subtasks: Examine the machinery for proper alignment, such as plowshares or mower blades.
Measure the alignment using tools such as a string or laser level.
Make necessary adjustments to achieve straight lines or even cuts.
Test the adjusted machinery to ensure accuracy.

tasks.task: Disassembling and reattaching windrow catchers on a combine harvester.
subtasks: Halt the combine harvester operation and acquire necessary tools.
Remove the existing windrow catcher, handling sharp edges carefully.
Inspect the catcher for wear or damage.
Install the replacement catcher or make needed repairs.
Reconnect all components and ensure they are secure.

tasks.task: Attaching chains to a tractor.
subtasks: Approach the tractor and access the hitch area.
Identify the correct chain for attachment.
Lift the chain and position it over the tractor's hitch.
Secure the chain to the tractor using appropriate fasteners.

tasks.task: Operating a bulldozer to cut down trees.
subtasks: Enter the bulldozer and start the engine.
Position the bulldozer at the edge of the area with trees.
Engage the blade and move it to cut down the trees.
Navigating the bulldozer around obstacles while cutting.
Load fallen trees onto transport vehicles.
Clean up debris and ensure site safety after completion.

tasks.task: Driving a John Deere tractor to till fields.
subtasks: Start the John Deere tractor and conduct pre-operation checks.
Operate the tractor to navigate to the fields.
Engage the tilling attachments and initiate the tillage process.
Monitor and adjust the depth of the tillage as needed.
Continue tilling until the fields are properly prepared.

tasks.task: Mounting and riding an all-terrain vehicle (ATV) to inspect crops.
subtasks: Prepare the ATV by checking fuel, tires, and safety gear.
Start the ATV and drive to the inspection area.
Navigate through rows of crops while looking for signs of stress or disease.
Document any issues observed during the inspection.
Descend from the ATV safely at the conclusion of the inspection.

tasks.task: Pumping irrigation water onto farmland.
subtasks: Operate the irrigation pump to start water flow.
Regulate the water pressure and flow rate to match field needs.
Navigate the irrigation system to cover all necessary areas.
Monitor the irrigation process to prevent overwetting or uneven distribution.

tasks.task: Fixing a side mirror on a tractor.
subtasks: Secure the tractor in a safe, stable location.
Identify the broken side mirror and gather replacement parts.
Remove the damaged mirror, following safety precautions.
Align the new mirror with the existing components.
Secure the mirror in place using the proper mounting method.
Test the mirror's functionality and adjust as necessary.

tasks.task: Assisting with the loading of hay onto a flatbed truck.
subtasks: Gather the hay from the storage area and transport it to the loading zone.
Lift the hay bales onto the truck bed, ensuring even distribution.
Secure the hay to prevent movement during transport.
Verify that the load is safe and stable.

tasks.task: Compacting soil with a steamroller.
subtasks: Position the steamroller at the designated compaction area.
Start the steamroller and roll over the soil to compact it.
Monitor the compaction process for optimal results.
Move the steamroller to new areas as needed.

tasks.task: Conducting hay bale substrate sampling.
subtasks: Secure the appropriate tools for sampling (e.g., trowel, ziplock bag).
Locate the area within the hay bale where sampling is needed.
Break open the hay bale carefully without causing too much dust.
Collect a representative sample of substrate from the hay.
Seal the sample in the container and label it properly.

tasks.task: Transferring sand from a truck to a storage bin.
subtasks: Open the truck bed and wait for it to stabilize.
Wear protective gear appropriate for handling sand.
Use a scoop or shovel to transfer sand into the storage bin.
Ensure the sand is evenly distributed in the bin.
Close the bin cover if applicable and secure it.

tasks.task: Preparing a truck to haul sand.
subtasks: Check the truck's tires, brakes, and overall condition.
Attach weigh scales to verify load weight if necessary.
Load the sand onto the truck, ensuring it is balanced and secure.
Secure the tarp or cover over the sand load.
Start the truck and transport it to the designated location.

tasks.task: Loading irrigation pipe onto a flatbed.
subtasks: Organize the pipe sections and prepare them for stacking.
Lift the pipe onto the flatbed, often requiring coordination with others.
Secure the pipe with straps or chains to prevent movement during transport.
Verify that all sections are accounted for and properly loaded.

tasks.task: Transporting soil samples to the office.
subtasks: Collect the soil samples from the field, using a shovel or sampling tool.
Package the samples in containers with identifying labels.
Load the samples into a vehicle.
Maintain the integrity of the samples during transportation.

tasks.task: Loading a John Deere skid steer with fertilizer.
subtasks: Position the skid steer in the fertilizer storage area.
Unload the fertilizer into the skid steer's hopper.
Check the hopper for proper filling and secure any lids.
Transport the skid steer to the field, maintaining balance.

tasks.task: Adjusting the alignment of farm machinery.
subtasks: Examine the machinery for proper alignment, such as plowshares or mower blades.
Measure the alignment using tools such as a string or laser level.
Make necessary adjustments to achieve straight lines or even cuts.
Test the adjusted machinery to ensure accuracy.

Remove the existing windrow catcher, handling sharp edges carefully.
Inspect the catcher for wear or damage.

tasks.task: MAINTASK
~27 subtasks. Tasks are farming-related with physical components.
